text: Hungry Howie's Pizza is an American fast food restaurant and the 11th largest pizza chain in the country. It has 550 locations. Its products include pizza, calzone, chicken wings and tenders, bread, salads, and cookies. Its headquarters are in Madison Heights, Michigan. in Metro Detroit. James Hearn opened the first Hungry Howie's on Telegraph Road in Taylor, Michigan in 1973. == Other websites == * Hungry Howie's â€“ Official website Category:1973 establishments in the United States Category:1970s establishments in Michigan Category:American fast food restaurants Category:Pizza franchises Category:Companies based in Michigan
title: Hungry Howie's Pizza
